content: tiative rolls. Paladins in BG3 primarily use Charisma to determine the bonus granted by their Aura of Protection and the number of Spells they can Prepare at one time. Charisma also determines the DC enemies must beat to save against your spell effects, however are very few offensive Paladin Spells that require the target to make a Saving Throw.
